segments.text: My attention is drawn to the precarious nature of everything here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still gushing, creating a wider and wider puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the cold splash from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool beneath the boy looks like it's about to give way any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's just reaching for another cookie, completely oblivious to his impending fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up, ready to grab her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s going to be a loud crash when that stool finally tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just waiting for the moment the woman finally notices everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her surprise will be immense, I'm sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sudden noise of the fall will surely break her trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the plate she holds will also shatter then.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s an escalating disaster, playing out right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me incredibly nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I brace myself for the inevitable climax.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess this is going to be!
segments.speaker: PAR
